channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse: ‘The SEC created this mess’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Brad Garlinghouse has lashed out at the SEC for its "absurd" comments on the Ripple Labs case.

item.title: Sleeping Bitcoin wallet stirs after 11 years, moving over $30M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The anonymous Bitcoin whale is up over 600,000% from their 2011 purchase of BTC at $4.92.

item.title: Federal Reserve of San Francisco hiring crypto architect for CBDC project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: San Francisco’s Federal Reserve Bank is seeking a crypto architect for a central bank digital currency.

item.title: Alphapo hot wallets hacked for over $31 million
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The funds have been reportedly taken on the Ethereum blockchain. The number of Bitcoins stolen remains uncertain.

item.title: Bitcoin’s dull price action ignites buying interest in LINK, FIL, SNX and THETA
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: LINK, FIL, SNX and THETA are starting to look bullish right as Bitcoin prepares for a volatile price move.

item.title: Arkansas counties rush to pass noise regulations for crypto miners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Several counties in the U.S. state of Arkansas are hurrying to adopt new ordinances before August when crypto mining facilities will be subject to the same rules as data centers.

item.title: Ripple effect? Stellar (XLM) is catching up to XRP price gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: XLM has turned most overbought since April 2021, boosting risks of a 30% price decline by September.

item.title: Bitcoin can still hit $19K, warns trader ahead of BTC price ‘big move’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price should see a serious shake-up in the coming days, but Bitcoin market participants are increasingly worried it will be to the downside.

item.title: Nigerian central bank adds NFC upgrade to eNaira for contactless payments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The central bank reportedly emphasized that the addition of NFC technology will play a crucial role in boosting the adoption rates for the CBDC.

item.title: SEC’s appeal won’t be a setback for XRP holders — Pro XRP lawyer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: John Deaton elaborated on the possible scenarios and intricacies of enforcing the summary judgment.

item.title: Evidence of crypto usage by ISIS is mounting — TRM Labs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Blockchain intelligence platform TRM Labs revealed that USDT on the Tron network is the primary choice for transactions among ISIS affiliates across Asia.

item.title: Terra interim CEO says any ‘little progress’ made gets derailed by accusations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Terraform Labs recently appointed CEO, Chris Amani, held a Twitter Spaces to separate the operations of Terraform Labs from Do Kwon’s personal affairs.

item.title: SEC reviews Ripple ruling, US bill seeks control over DeFi, and more: Hodler’s Digest, July 16-22
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: The SEC examines the ruling in the Ripple case, a U.S. Senate bill seeks to regulate DeFi, and the poor performance of altcoins in the second quarter of 2023.

item.title: Solana’s Parrot Protocol submits proposal to go tokenless, investors risk facing -89% returns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The proposal calls for the redemption of PRT tokens for liquid treasury value and the transition to a no-token protocol. Community members referred to the move as a “financial crime.”

item.title: Ripple applies for crypto license in the United Kingdom
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Ripple applied for registration as a crypto asset firm with the United Kingdom’s Financial Conduct Authority after its partial win against the U.S. SEC.

item.title: Celsius Network reaches settlements to exit bankruptcy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Bankrupted crypto lender Celsius Network reached two settlements that may allow the return of assets to customers and end its bankruptcy proceedings.

item.title: What is the difference between DApps and protocols?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Discover the contrasting functions of DApps and protocols in the blockchain world, and gain insights into how they contribute to the growth of decentralized technologies.

item.title: OpenAI launches official ChatGPT app for Android
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The company provided a preorder page in the Google Play Store, allowing users to register for installation once the app is ready.

item.title: AI companies commit to safe and transparent AI — White House
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The Biden Administration emphasized the responsibility of AI companies to ensure their products are safe for use.

item.title: Nigerian social payments app shuts down crypto exchange services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The company said it would shut its exchange services as part of the shareholders’ decision to restructure the business to focus on Cashlink.

item.title: SEC hints at potential appeal to XRP ruling from Ripple Labs lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: According to court documents, the SEC stated it is now “considering the various available avenues for further review” on the ruling.

item.title: Twitter to impose daily limits on DMs for unverified accounts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Twitter has not specified what the daily DM limits will be, and the move hasn’t been well-received by both verified and unverified users.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Binance slashes costs, Ripple ready for US banks and crypto VCs return
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz looks at Binance’s ongoing efforts to curb declining profits, Ripple’s expectation that U.S. banks may soon adopt XRP and the first signs of venture capital returning to crypto.

item.title: AI21 Labs debuts anti-hallucination feature for GPT chatbots
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Contextual Answers is designed for enterprise but could have far-reaching implications for the generative AI sector.

item.title: Centralized exchanges will become gateways for DeFi: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had a mixed week, with most of the tokens continuing to trade in a similar range as the previous week.

item.title: UK court grants appeal from Craig Wright in Bitcoin rights lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The decision reverses a prior ruling, allowing Craig Wright to appeal a lawsuit claiming copyright to the Bitcoin white paper and database.

item.title: Litecoin price at risk of a 30% drop if key LTC futures historical trend repeats
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: A multiyear review of Litecoin futures open interest reveals a unique trend that has significantly impacted the LTC price in the past.

item.title: Price analysis 7/21: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, ADA, SOL, DOGE, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Several Bitcoin price indicators suggest that BTC’s narrow trading range could end soon, resulting in a volatile price move in BTC and altcoins.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s brother planned to buy island and prep for apocalypse: court filing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to court documents, Gabriel Bankman-Fried wrote a memo to the FTX Foundation with a plan to build a bunker to survive “some event where 50%-99.99% of people die."

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.
